  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114055</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114055</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Electron beam crossing a magnetic field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Elektronenstrahl, der ein magnetisches 
kreuzt, fangen auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Faisceau d'électrons croisant un champ 
magnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Feixe de elétron que cruza um campo magnético</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fascio elettronico che attraversa un campo 
magnetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δέσμη ηλεκτρονίων που διασχίζει ένα μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Haz electrónico que cruza un campo magnético</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that the electron beam path is deflected when the beam passes through a magnetic field.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electron beams</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">paths</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß der 
Elektronenstrahlpfad abgelenkt wird, wenn der Lichtstrahl durch ein 
magnetisches auffangen überschreitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre que la voie d'accès
de faisceau d'électrons est guidée quand le faisceau traverse un 
champ magnétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que o trajeto de 
feixe do elétron está deflexionado quando o feixe passa através de 
um campo magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che il percorso del
fascio elettronico è deviato quando il fascio attraversa un campo 
magnetico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι το μονοπάτι 
δεσμών ηλεκτρονίων εκτρέπεται όταν περνά η ακτίνα μέσω ενός 
μαγνητικού πεδίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que el camino del haz
electrónico está desviado cuando la viga pasa a través de un campo 
magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">aktuell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektronenstrahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
